entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
